altTitles.en: I Love My President Though He Is a Psycho

description.en:
Do you want to steal my genes then leave?? He grabbed her and tried to force her to hand over the child that was born three years ago.

She never had a baby? Then conceive one!

The delusional CEO's desperate love. Her inability to resist as she fell deeper…
  
Based on the webnovel by Jiang Xiao Ya (姜小牙).

---
**Original Web Manhua:** [AC.QQ](http://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/628414), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24476), [KuaiKan Manhua](http://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1696/), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/212432/), [U17](http://www.u17.com/comic/165140.html), [Zymk](http://www.zymk.cn/2130/)

**Official Translations:** 
* English: [Bilibili Comics](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc461), [INKR](https://inkr.com/title/950), [Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/785), [WebComics](http://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5ce66ebd62661d387f504a32)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://mangatoon.mobi/id/boss-sombong?content_id=785)
* [Korean / 한국어](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=3462869)
description.id:
Seorang anak imajiner. Dia mengikatnya satu per satu paranoia yang tak bisa dijelaskan, seorang kaisar yang kuat, seekor anjing tunggal yang tidak memiliki cinta di dunia,dengan kuat terikat pada sarang cinta, pelecehan hati, studi tentang cinta, orang-orang tidak punya hak untuk melawannya,dia dipanggil "Gongou"

---
**Original Web Manhua:** [AC.QQ](http://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/628414), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24476), [KuaiKan Manhua](http://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1696/), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/212432/), [U17](http://www.u17.com/comic/165140.html), [Zymk](http://www.zymk.cn/2130/)

description.ru:
Деспота из Британии и красавицу-маньхуацзя связывает вымышленный ребенок. Она не имеет права сопротивляться...

---
**Original Web Manhua:** [AC.QQ](http://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/628414), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24476), [KuaiKan Manhua](http://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1696/), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/212432/), [U17](http://www.u17.com/comic/165140.html), [Zymk](http://www.zymk.cn/2130/)

description.zh:
子虚乌有的孩子。将他——莫名的偏执，铁腕而强权的现世帝王；将她——穷困美女漫画家，绝世缺爱单身狗；牢牢捆绑在了爱的温床，虐的心房，情的书房，欲的厨房…………她没有反抗的权利，一切只因他叫做“宫欧”……

---
**Original Web Manhua:** [AC.QQ](http://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/628414), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24476), [KuaiKan Manhua](http://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1696/), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/212432/), [U17](http://www.u17.com/comic/165140.html), [Zymk](http://www.zymk.cn/2130/)
